title: Giving Suggestions
description: Learn A2 suggestion sentences using 可以/應該/最好.

steps.teacher: 你可以坐地鐵，會比較快。
expected_answer: 你可以坐地鐵，會比較快。
steps.pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zuò dì tiě, huì bǐ jiào kuài.
steps.english_hint: You can take the metro, it's faster.

steps.teacher: 你應該帶雨傘，因為可能會下雨。
expected_answer: 你應該帶雨傘，因為可能會下雨。
steps.pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi dài yǔ sǎn, yīn wèi kě néng huì xià yǔ.
steps.english_hint: You should bring an umbrella because it might rain.

steps.teacher: 最好早一點出門，路上比較不塞。
expected_answer: 最好早一點出門，路上比較不塞。
steps.pinyin: zuì hǎo zǎo yì diǎn chū mén, lù shàng bǐ jiào bù sāi.
steps.english_hint: It's best to leave earlier; the road is less busy.

steps.teacher: 你可以在網路上查地圖。
expected_answer: 你可以在網路上查地圖。
steps.pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ zài wǎng lù shàng chá dì tú.
steps.english_hint: You can check the map online.

steps.teacher: 你應該問附近的人比較快。
expected_answer: 你應該問附近的人比較快。
steps.pinyin: nǐ yīng gāi wèn fù jìn de rén bǐ jiào kuài.
steps.english_hint: You should ask someone nearby; it's faster.

steps.teacher: 如果你趕時間，最好叫計程車。
expected_answer: 如果你趕時間，最好叫計程車。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ gǎn shí jiān, zuì hǎo jiào jì chéng chē.
steps.english_hint: If you're in a hurry, it's best to take a taxi.

steps.teacher: 你可以先看路牌，再決定往哪裡走。
expected_answer: 你可以先看路牌，再決定往哪裡走。
steps.pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ xiān kàn lù pái, zài jué dìng wǎng nǎ lǐ zǒu.
steps.english_hint: You can look at the street signs first, then decide.

steps.teacher: 如果太遠，你應該搭車，不要走路。
expected_answer: 如果太遠，你應該搭車，不要走路。
steps.pinyin: rú guǒ tài yuǎn, nǐ yīng gāi dā chē, bú yào zǒu lù.
steps.english_hint: If it's too far, you should take transportation, not walk.

steps.pinyin: zuì hǎo dài shuǐ, bù rán huì hěn kě.
steps.english_hint: You'd better bring water, or you'll get thirsty.

steps.teacher: 你可以先休息一下，再繼續走。
expected_answer: 你可以先休息一下，再繼續走。
steps.pinyin: nǐ kě yǐ xiān xiū xí yí xià, zài jì xù zǒu.
steps.english_hint: You can rest a bit before continuing.

review.summary: You practiced 10 natural A2 suggestion sentences.
review.mission: Next lesson: Simple future tense with 要/會/打算!
